extendedInfo.description: 80s Cartoon Soundboard: Thundercats! (Explicit) Bring back Saturday Morning, like you've never heard before!!  This Cartoon Sb is NOT meant for kids, put them to sleep early and fall out of your chair laughing!! Contains VERY EXPLICIT language!18 Thundercats sound clips from the 80s cartoon show.  6 ringtone ready clips (Rare Pilot Theme, Theme, End Credits, alterEGO Theme, Rembrandts Theme & Orchestral Theme!) & 12 great notification clips including cast bloopers (Explict!)80s Cartoon Soundboard: Thundercats! is the FIRST soundboard on the market that is fully controllable using user defined gestures!!!No more looking at the screen to hit the right button, just draw your gesture and the clip will play!All clips can be set as Ringtones, Notifications and now Alarms!  Wake up just like you did in the 80s!To set a ringtone, notification, alarm or gesture, LongPress on the desired clip and select the desired option.  (Note: Ringtones, Notifications, and Alarms require SD Card)Gestures can be deleted by LongPressing them on the gesture list.We have other modules that will work with this soundboard so you will be able to swipe left and right between your installed 80s Cartoon Soundboards!  No more having to exit the app, open the launcher and opening the next soundboard.Compatible 80s Cartoon Soundboards:80s Cartoon Sb: Voltron!80s Cartoon Sb: TMNT!80s Cartoon Sb: Themes!80s Cartoon Sb: Transformers!plus many more coming soon!App2SD compatible (Android 2.2+ Froyo required) takes just 236k on device.  (NOTE:  On some devices the external memory is too slow and may cause the follow issues: sounds only play for 1-2s, or you get an Application Not Responding error.  If this happens more the app over to internal memory)Permissions required and why:android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Write ringtones, notifications, and alarms to external storage so they are available to the system.android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS - Set ringtone, notification or alarm as the active system ringtone/notification/alarm.android.permission.INTERNET - Show Adsandroid.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Show Ads

reviews.title: Fisher-Price my first curse word.
reviews.comment: The outtakes are lackluster, and painfully repetitive. Hey guys, just because you drop the f-bomb doesn\'t make something funny. Epic fail...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Keep. It real
reviews.comment: I love. This. App some. People slammed it but remember we where kids they where grownups they did for us bless um especially know adays

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: What\'s up with all the swearing? Just b/c lion-o swears doesn\'t make it funny. The cartoon I remember didn\'t have f-bombs, and was child friendly. On to the next thundercats sb.
reviews.author: A Google User
